CustomField.label: Type
CustomField.description: Printer driver type. zpl = Zebra thermal label printer over TCP (default port 9100). raw = any printer accepting raw bytes over TCP (receipt, thermal, etc.). cups = printer managed by CUPS on the same Linux host as the print server (uses lp command). ipp = network printer with built-in IPP support, e.g. most modern office printers (host field should be the full IPP URL or just the hostname — server connects on port 631).

value.label: CUPS — printer on local CUPS daemon
